"Properties" {
	"Authors" "Areng"
	"Description" 
		{
		"" "Makes the player invisible when activated. While invisible, turrets, rocket turrets, and the motion sensor cannot see you. Deactivate to become visible again."
		"" ""
		"" "__Note:__ Place the Visibility item on the entrance door and on save points so the portal gun becomes visible again if the player dies while invisible. Also, do not add save points anywhere where the player can get it while invisible as loading will break the invisibility's effects."
	}
	"Icon"
	{
		"0" "beepkg/invisibility.png"
	}
}
